Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network

Class TopologicalLink

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.TopologicalLink
public class TopologicalLink extends Object
This class represents an link (edge) from a network graph.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Thomas Hohnstein
